dmca.title: Your Web Site, wefundmortages.com
dmca.body:
Subj:   Your Web Site, wefundmortages.com 
Date:   Wed, 13 Mar 2002 1:36:33 PM Eastern Standard Time 
From:   BLJEDI5 
To:   wefundmortgages@hotmail.com 
 
Dear Mr. Hardwick,
I recently recieved the attached email advertising your web site.  This is
your notification that further messages advertising any site owned or
operated by you will be subject to a $500 download and archival fee. 
Emailing me by you or anyone employed, contracted, or in any other means paid
by you or your company, will be conisdered your electronic signature that you
will pay said fee.  All invoices will be sent to the following address:
Travis Hardwick
49 Frontier Rd
Pooler, Ga 31405

If you do not wish to be billed, discontinue sending advertisements to my
email address, bljedi5@aol.com.

Ken Buckler
Smithsburg, MD

 
Forwarded Message: 
Subj:   NOTICE: You Are Approved 
Date:   Wed, 13 Mar 2002 12:23:19 PM Eastern Standard Time 
From:   <mtgreq99@uole.com> 
To:   <bljeans2@aol.com> 
CC:   <bljeans@aol.com>, <bljeansv@aol.com>, <bljedi1@aol.com>, <bljedi5@aol.com>, <bljedi@aol.com> 
 
The easiest just got easier!

Mortgage companies make you wait...They Demand to Interview you...
They Intimidate you...They Humiliate you...
And All of That is While They Decide If They Even Want to 
Do Business With You...

We Turn the Tables on Them...
Now, You're In Charge

Just Fill Out Our Simple Form and They Will Have to Compete For Your Business...

CLICK HERE FOR THE FORM AND MORE DETAILS

We have hundreds of loan programs, including:
Purchase Loans
Refinance
Debt Consolidation
Home Improvement 
Second Mortgages
No Income Verification

CLICK HERE FOR THE FORM AND MORE DETAILS


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

If you no longer wish to receive any of our mailings you may be 
permanently removed by Clicking Here.
If there has been any inconvenience we apologize.
 

0108ofzF2-237vzIM8908AjMZ3-487vZbF5629eflP6-016l44
